integration_patterns: Data synchronization between EHRs using FHIR

evidence.claim: Altos utilizes AWS for hosting and serverless computing.
The company mentions compliance with HIPAA regulations on their security page.
Altos integrates with EHR systems using FHIR standards in their health-tech solutions.
The integration of X12 transaction sets like 837 is highlighted in their case studies.
Descriptions of using managed services like Azure Functions indicate cloud-native application development.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 standards for healthcare data exchange, aligns with API automation needs.
